Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Adjuvant/Multidrug Resistance Modulator/SDZ 280-446
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A novel semi-synthetic derivative of cyclosporin and a cyclodepsipeptide with chemo-sensitizing activity. SDZ 280-446 is one of the drug resistance-modifying agents that inhibit P-glycoprotein, the multidrug resistance efflux pump, thereby restoring the retention and activities of some drugs in drug-resistant tumor cells.
